TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripItemTextRenderEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripRenderer1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripRenderer1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
